Dropping temperatures can't slow down your training runs when you protect core warmth with the Pearl Izumi(R) Fly Thermal Top.
Semiform fit follows the body's contours without being restrictive during high performance activity.

Thermal Fleece abric: ? Low-pile fleece retains and disperses warmth.? Wicks energy-sapping perspiration away from the skin to evaporate from the surface.? Body-mapped placement allows for warmth and breathability where you need them most.

When you're performing at your peak - or at the peak - you need gear that can keep up. The superb breathability and lightweight performance of the Echo Tee(TM) keeps you moving through your high-altitude training or everyday workout.
Trim Fit is a close, next-to-skin cut designed to move with you.

AirVent(TM) fabric:? Lightweight poly is specially knit for high airflow and active breathability.? Moisture-wicking performance moves perspiration away from the skin to dry quickly on the surface.? UPF 15 fabrication protects your skin during outdoor activity by blocking harmful Ultraviolet A and Ultraviolet B rays (UVA and UVB).

Setting your sights on one of the 14 peaks in the world over 8,000 meters? Get your kit right with this essential baselayer!
Articulated construction and four-way stretch enhance comfort and allow a wider range of movement.
MTF (moisture transfer fiber) wicks energy-sapping perspiration away from the core.
UPF 40 fabrication protects the skin during outdoor activity by blocking harmful Ultraviolet A and Ultraviolet B rays (UVA and UVB).
Non-abrasive Bio-Silver(R) yarns deliver permanent, silver-based antimicrobial properties to reduce the impact of odor causing bacteria.
Front zip opening with interior wind flap and chin-saving zipper garage.
Heavier ME XT fabric panels at shoulders, upper arms, and upper back provide increased warmth.
Thumb loops keep sleeves extended and hands warmer.
Flat seams reduce chafing and increase comfort.
89% polyester, 11% spandex.Contrast: 97% nylon, 3% spandex.Panels: 92% polyester, 8% spandex.
Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.

Heavier ME XT fabric panels at shoulders, upper arms, and upper back provide increased warmth.
Thumb loops keep sleeves extended and hands warmer.
Flat seams reduce chafing and increase comfort.
89% polyester, 11% spandex.Contrast: 90% nylon, 10% spandex.Panels: 92% polyester, 8% spandex.
Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.
